original_text: More and more people became believers and they joined the group. So now many men and women believed in the Lord Jesus.
korean_text: 믿고 주께로 나아오는 자가 더 많으니 남녀의 큰 무리더라

sentences.original_text: More and more people became believers
sentences.korean_translation: 점점 더 많은 사람들이 믿는 자들이 되었고

sentences.original_text: So now many men and women
